subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Jameer Nelson led Orlando with 24 points, and the Celtics lost two players to injury and one to an ejection as the Magic won Game 5 of the Eastern Conference finals.
snippet: Jameer Nelson led Orlando with 24 points, and the Celtics lost two players to injury and one to an ejection as the Magic won Game 5 of the Eastern Conference finals.
